titles: Good counsell for evil times. Or, A plain sermon preached at Pauls in London, April 16. 1648. / By Edw: Bowles M.A. of Katherin-Hall Cambridge. Printed by the desire and order of the Lord Maior and aldermen of that famous city.
author: Bowles, Edward, 1613-1662.
publisher: Printed by F: Neile for Samuel Gellibrand, and are to be sold at his Shop at the Brasen Serpent in Pauls Church-yard,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Bible. --  N.T. --  Ephesians V, 15-16 --  Sermons --  Early works to 1800.
